duties_responsibilities.duty: Gather requirements and conduct research to align business needs with IT capabilities.
Participate in meetings with business and IT stakeholders to collect functional and non-functional requirements.
Contribute to Proof of Concept projects by evaluating vendor products and solutions to ensure alignment with business and IT requirements.
Document technical standards and develop templates for technologies such as SSIS, AWS, etc.
Assist in code and SQL review for ETL and AWS tasks.
Handle operational tasks, solve incidents, and troubleshoot issues.

education_certification.credential: Enrolled as a full-time student in Computer Science or a related field. Preference to current seniors or graduate students.
Enthusiastic about continuous learning and adapting to new technologies and concepts.
